gobblin.util

Class SerializationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.util.SerializationUtils

  • public class SerializationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class for serializing and deserializing Objects to/from Strings.

      Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using the given BaseEncoding, which must be the same BaseEncoding used to serialize the object.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> java.lang.String serialize(T obj)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize an object into a String. The object is first serialized into a byte array, which is converted into a String using BaseEncoding.base64().
        Parameters:
        obj - A Serializable object
        Returns:
        A String representing the input object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to serialize the object

      • serialize

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> java.lang.String serialize(T obj,
                                                                          com.google.common.io.BaseEncoding enc)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize an object into a String. The object is first serialized into a byte array, which is converted into a String using the given BaseEncoding.
        Parameters:
        obj - A Serializable object
        enc - The BaseEncoding used to encode a byte array.
        Returns:
        A String representing the input object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to serialize the object

      • deserialize

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> T deserialize(java.lang.String serialized,
                                                             java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using BaseEncoding.base64().
        Parameters:
        serialized - The serialized String
        clazz - The class the deserialized object should be cast to.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to deserialize the object

      • deserialize

        public static <T extends java.io.Serializable> T deserialize(java.lang.String serialized,
                                                             java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                             com.google.common.io.BaseEncoding enc)
                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Deserialize a String obtained via serialize(Serializable) into an object, using the given BaseEncoding, which must be the same BaseEncoding used to serialize the object.
        Parameters:
        serialized - The serialized String
        clazz - The class the deserialized object should be cast to.
        enc - The BaseEncoding used to decode the String.
        Returns:
        The deserialized object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to deserialize the object

      • serializeState

        public static <T extends gobblin.configuration.State> void serializeState(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                          org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path jobStateFilePath,
                                                                          T state)
                                                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize a State instance to a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        fs - the FileSystem instance for creating the file
        jobStateFilePath - the path to the file
        state - the State to serialize
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to serialize the State instance

      • deserializeState

        public static <T extends gobblin.configuration.State> void deserializeState(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                                                            org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path jobStateFilePath,
                                                                            T state)
                                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        Deserialize/read a State instance from a file.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the State object type
        Parameters:
        fs - the FileSystem instance for opening the file
        jobStateFilePath - the path to the file
        state - an empty State instance to deserialize into
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if it fails to deserialize the State instance
